pullrequest.title: Expanding the functionality of the plugin framework, and introducing PluginPtr and specializations

content.raw:
I believe all of the current reviewer feedback on this PR has been addressed. Please let me know if I've overlooked anything.

If anyone has a chance to give this another look over, it would be appreciated.

I've split examples out into [a separate PR](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/95/) to make them easier to review. I don't know if we want to merge in those examples before or after merging this PR to default; I don't have a preference between the two.
content.html:
I believe all of the current reviewer feedback on this PR has been addressed. Please let me know if I've overlooked anything.

If anyone has a chance to give this another look over, it would be appreciated.

I've split examples out into a separate PR to make them easier to review. I don't know if we want to merge in those examples before or after merging this PR to default; I don't have a preference between the two.
